availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Beeler. Father of Lorenzo W. Beeler, Emma P. Beeler, Bettie Beeler, John Beeler, and William Beeler. Merchant in Nelson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved individuals in Nelson County in 1850. Merchant in Lebanon in 1860. Owned four enslaved individuals in Lebanon in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 2, p. 345A.
